short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A button that quickly updates the closest bookmark found to the open tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Update existing bookmarks while surfing the web, and create new bookmarks if your current tab doesn't match any of your saved bookmarks.
